pair.title: Pair GitLab project
pair.intro: Specify GitLab instance (default is gitlab.com), the project id (you can find it at the left side on top of the project page in GitLab) and a valid access token having api_read rights
pair.noAccess: Based on your input, Homey cannot pair the project

pair.title: Pair GitLab group
pair.intro: Specify GitLab instance (default is gitlab.com), the group id (you can find it at the left side on top of the group page in GitLab) and a valid access token having api_read rights
pair.noAccess: Based on your input, Homey cannot pair the group

pair.title: Pair GitLab user
pair.intro: Specify GitLab instance (default is gitlab.com) and a valid access token having api_read and api_write rights
pair.noAccess: Based on your input, Homey cannot pair the user
